item.title: Transferred Github Pages generator to Nikola Generated site
item.dc:creator: ShadowKyogre
item.description: Took the time the past few days to migrate my Github userpage to be generated by Nikola. Looks kinda bland, buuut, at least I have more control over the theme. I WILL be making it more pretty later. Promise...ish? Be sure to also check the about page for all that juicy bio stuff on me.
item.category: oh wow this is really easy
